com.lss233.phoenix.world

Interface EntityUniverse

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Chunk, World

    public interface EntityUniverse
    A container of Entity instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<Entity> createEntity(EntityType entityType, Vector vector)
      Create an entity instance at the given position.
      List<Entity> getEntities()
      Return a list of entities contained within this world.
      Optional<Entity> getEntity(UUID uniqueId)
      Gets the entity whose UUID matches the provided id, possibly returning no entity if the entity is not loaded or non-existent.
      default List<Entity> getNearbyEntities(Location location, double distance)
      Return a list of entities contained within distance blocks of the specified location.
      List<Entity> getNearbyEntities(Vector location, double distance)
      Return a list of entities contained within distance blocks of the specified location.

    • Method Detail

      • createEntity

        Optional<Entity> createEntity(EntityType entityType,
                              Vector vector)
        Create an entity instance at the given position.
        Parameters:
        entityType - The type
        vector - The position
        Returns:
        An entity

      • getNearbyEntities

        List<Entity> getNearbyEntities(Vector location,
                               double distance)
        Return a list of entities contained within distance blocks of the specified location. This uses a sphere to test distances.
        Parameters:
        location - The location at the center of the search radius
        distance - The search radius
        Returns:
        A list of nearby entities

      • getNearbyEntities

        default List<Entity> getNearbyEntities(Location location,
                                       double distance)
        Return a list of entities contained within distance blocks of the specified location. This uses a sphere to test distances.
        Parameters:
        location - The location at the center of the search radius
        distance - The search radius
        Returns:
        A list of nearby entities

      • getEntities

        List<Entity> getEntities()
        Return a list of entities contained within this world.
        Returns:
        A list of entities

      • getEntity

        Optional<Entity> getEntity(UUID uniqueId)
        Gets the entity whose UUID matches the provided id, possibly returning no entity if the entity is not loaded or non-existent.
        Parameters:
        uniqueId - The unique id
        Returns:
        An entity
